long_description: Spy Libra Sunglasses for women take you from trail to town in style as they protect your eyes from harmful UV rays. Grilamid frames are lightweight yet impact resistant. Polycarbonate lenses are injected in a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles to reduce eyestrain. Black frames have Merlot Fade lenses; Mint Chip Fade frames have Bronze lenses. Spy Libra Sunglasses block 100% of harmful UV rays.
